name: Just5
tag_list: just5, easy-to-use-cell-phone, simple-cell-phone, best-senior-cell-phone, emergency-help-button, cell-phone-for-children
overview: Just5 was founded in 2007, and is one of the fastest growing cell phone companies in Europe. The company is a global provider of user friendly, easy to use mobile device optimized for the elderly and the young. Just5 Phones are the ultimate anti-dote for the overly complex phones that appeals to non-tech savvy users. The ideal feature of Just5 phones are its big buttons, high audio speakers, long lasting battery, and its highly sought Personal Emergency Response System (PERS). Just5’s unlocked feature with GSM multi- band capability makes it ideal for travel phone. Just5’s GSM technology also enable phone user to connect with any US, or Canadian GSM based service provider. Just5 has been awarded with multiple recognitions from iF Gold Awardee, Grand Prix Award, and the Red Dot Design award. Just5 is now collaborating with the biggest European Carriers: namely Vodafone, Megafon, and Beeline. It is also certified by US Federal Communication Commission (FCC) and the PCS Type Certification Review Board (PTCRB). The company is also boosting in with wider phone coverage in the US and Canada to ensure maximum signal reliability. Just5 continues to manufacture innovative phone designs while upholding the Just5 mobile tradition of simplicity and reliability.

video_embeds.description: Just5 Easy Phones at NBC Today show
